events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be in touch for next steps soon.
We completed the initial screening and believe your software engineering background fits well with our requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead developer.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled the HR interview for May 23rd to discuss your role, benefits, and company culture.
Your HR interview went well, and you have addressed all questions regarding your experience and career goals.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer; we look forward to you joining our engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been confirmed, and we are excited to have you onboard as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun; you will receive all necessary information and access to systems shortly.
The hiring process is now closed. Welcome officially to the engineering team, and we wish you great success.
